game.name: BREADSKATE
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roll, flip, and toast your way through a whimsical world in BREADSKATE a freeroam skating game! As a sentient loaf on wheels, master dynamic skating tricks, rebake the bread to your liking, customizing appearance and handling, and face off against skating duck rivals in a quest to save your world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Roll, flip, and toast your way through a whimsical world in BREADSKATE a freeroam skating game! As a sentient loaf on wheels, master dynamic skating tricks, rebake the bread to your liking, customizing appearance and handling, and face off against skating duck rivals in a quest to save your world.
